priya.util

Class Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • priya.util.Console

  • public class Console
extends java.lang.Object
    The Console Class represents a console and is used by programs to work with input and output functions of the class
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    priya

      java.lang.String getChoiceString(java.lang.String prompt, java.lang.String s1, java.lang.String s2)
      Validates that the user entered string is either s1 or s2 and returns the value
      double getDouble(java.lang.String prompt)
      Validates that the user has entered a valid double and saves the double and returns it
      double getDoubleWithinRange(java.lang.String prompt, double min, double max)
      Validates that the user has entered a valid double between min and max and saves the double and returns it

      Validates that the user has entered a valid number and saves the number and returns it

      Gets user entered string and returns it validates that it is not null

      Method outputs a line with the String s on to the console without a trailing new line
      void println()
      Outputs an empty line to the Console
      void println(java.lang.String s)
      Method outputs a line with the String s on to the console with a trailing new line
